rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target creature you control has base power and toughness X/X until end of turn, where X is the number of enchantments you control.
When Lykaretos dies, bless target land. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant land
Enchanted land has “{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. You gain 1 life.”
